summary: This is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It references a disc containing discovery materials for Ghislaine Maxwell and is signed by Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for whom discovery materials are being provided.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The signatory of the letter, representing the U.S. Department of Justice in the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, is the prosecuting authority in the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Discovery Materials Submission
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends a disc containing discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It confirms the transfer of discovery materials on a disc to the detention center where Maxwell was likely held.
Audrey Strauss was serving as the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time.
The case reference indicates ongoing federal prosecution of Maxwell as of December 2020.
